title: Pantiani Lake
about: Pantiani Lake (Pantiani Reservoir) is located in Kvemo Kartli region, Dmanisi Municipality, at an altitude of 1368 meters above sea level. The area of the water mirror is 0.6 kmÂ². It is an artificial reservoir surrounded by coniferous forest. A lake hidden deeply in the greenery creates a wonderful environment for nature lovers and to escape from summer heat. This place is perfect for a picnic and having pleasant time with friends or family. Pantiani Lake is a nice place for fishing lovers you can catch here carp, white amur and trout. The forest, the fresh air, the lush greenery of the lake and the beautiful scenery fill you with positive energy and create put you in good spirits.
